item.title: Aspose.Words for SharePoint 2.6.0 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Words for SharePoint 2.6.0 Aspose.Words for SharePoint 2.6 Release NotesThis release includes the latest improvements and fixes made in Aspose.Words for .NET. Most notable are:• Implemented embedded EMF+ metafiles rendering;• Implemented font style simulation while rendering to PDF;• Improved rendering of gray colors to PDF for proper printing;• Improved PDF A1/B compatibility;• Improved EMF rendering• Better validation of generated DOCX documents through OpenXML SDK 2.
